metadata.methodology: Scores based on weighted analysis of legal frameworks, enforcement, surveillance practices, and user rights protections. Entertainment scores consider streaming access, content diversity, and censorship levels. Online regulation scores evaluate consumer protection, digital rights enforcement, and platform accountability.
